name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Dark Theme for OTRS by V. Slugin

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a dark theme for OTRS by V. Slugin (vsdev.).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Please allow the extension only for your OTRS site in your Chrome settings.
Please contact me, if you found bugs.
